title: Farhath Haadhy – Queen of Mehendi in Sri Lanka
content: — By Dr.Telli.C.Rajaratnam — Winner of the All Island Mehndi competition –Bridal & Beyond held at BMICH Farhath Haadhy is a household name in Sri Lanka amongst Buddhist, Hindu, Indian, Muslim brides and girls of all ages. Farhath Haadhy clad in “abaya”  her entire face except for the eyes are covered according to traditional Islamic…
